trans-unit.source: A Decodable Reader is a book that carefully limits the letters and words used so that it fits what a new reader is ready to read. Typically a language may have 5 - 10 decodable stages through which learners progress.
trans-unit.target: Jun Wuj sik’ital uwach are jun wuj k’o ri kel wi chajim ukojijk ri uwach taq tz’ib’ xuquje’ k’i taq tzij rech qas are k’olik jeqalik ri jun k’ak’ sik’inel rech xutzirik chech usik’ixik uwach. Ronojel wi jun tzijob’al kk’oji’ ne job’ k’a pa lajuj k’i uq’e’tal sik’ital uwach rumal ri’ kepaqi’ ri tijoxelab’.

alt-trans.target: Jun Wuj sik’talik uwach are jun wuj k’o ri ke’el wi chijim ukojijk ri uwach taq tz’ib’ xuquje’ k’i taq tzij rech qas are k’olik jeqalik ri jun k’ak’ sik’inel rech xutzirik che usik’ixik uwach. Ronojel wi jun tzijob’al kk’uji’ ne job’ k’pa lajuj k’i uq’e’tal sik’talik uwach rumal ri’ kepaqi’ ri tijoxelab’.

Jun Wuj sik’talik uwach Are jun wuj b'anom rech ukojik k’o ri ke’el wi xuquje' chijim ukojijk ri uwach taq tz’ib’ xuquje’ k’i taq tzij rech qas are' jeqtalik che jun k’ak’ sik’inel rech xutzirik rech usik’ixik uwach. Ronojel wi, jun tzijob’al kk’uji’ ne job’ k’pa lajuj q’e’tal sik’talik uwach rumal ri’ kepaqi’ ri tijoxelab’.

Jun Wuj sik’talik uwach Are jun wuj b'anom rech ukojik k’o ri ke’el wi xuquje' chijim ukojijk ri uwach taq tz’ib’ xuquje’ k’i taq tzij rech qas are jeqalik che jun k’ak’ sik’inel rech xutzirik rech usik’ixik uwach. Ronojel wi, jun tzijob’al kk’uji’ ne job’ k’pa lajuj q’e’tal sik’talik uwach rumal ri’ kepaqi’ ri tijoxelab’.

trans-unit.source: Bloom helps you to define this sequence of stages that readers work through. Each book you create will be targeted at one of those stages, and Bloom helps you to make sure that your book is decodable (figure out-able) by learners at that stage.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ktuto’ chech rilik ri kematal wi che ri etapas rumal ri sik’inel taq rech keq’axik. Jujun taq wuj kb’an la kb’e chech jun chi kech ri uq’e’tal ya’talik xuquje’ Bloom qas ktob’anik chech rilik we are awuj wuj sik’talik uwach (kb’an kowinem chech usik’ixik uwach) kumal ri tijoxelab’ chi upam rech etapa.

alt-trans.target: Bloom ktuto’ che rilik ri kematal wi che ri etapas rumal ri sik’inel taq rech keq’axik. Jujun taq wuj kb’an la kb’e che jun chi kech ri uq’e’tal ya’talik, xuquje’ Bloom qas kto’b’anik che rilik we are awuj wuj sik’talik uwach (kb’an kowinem che usik’ixik uwach) kmal ri tijoxelab’ chi upam rech etapa.

trans-unit.source: You can also make a Bloom Pack of templates that others can use to quickly create books based on the levels and stages that have been prepared by a literacy specialist.
trans-unit.target: Xuquje’ katkowinik kab’an jun Woktanaj rech Bloom rech plantillas rech nik’aj chik kekowinik kkikojo chech utikik k'ak' taq no'jwuj chi upam ri q’at xuquje’ q’e’tal ri kib'anom kumal ri nima'q taq kino'jib'al rech tijonik.

alt-trans.target: Xuquje’ katkowinik kab’an jun tanaj rech ri Bloom rech plantillas che nik’aj chik kekowinik kkojo rech utikik ma k’axta kkiraq che ub’anik wuj chupam ri q’at xuquje’ q’e’tal che xutzir rumal jun k’o ret’amab’al pa uwi’ ri tijonik.

trans-unit.source: To learn about using Decodable Readers in Bloom, you can:
trans-unit.target: Chech reta’maxik jas ukojik Wuj Sik’ital uwach chi upam ri Bloom, katkowinik:

alt-trans.target: Rech reta’maxik su ukojik Wuj Sik’talik uwach chi upam ri Bloom, katkowinik:

trans-unit.target: Chwila' we silob'wachib'al rech uya’ik no'jib'al.

alt-trans.target: Chwila' we solob’ilb’al wachib’al rech uya’ik no'j.

trans-unit.source: Go to the Help menu, choose 'Help', and look in the index under "Decodable Readers".
trans-unit.target: Jat pa cholb’al chak rech Tob'anem, chcha’ ‘Tob’anem’ xuquje’ chatzukuj "Wuj sik’ital uwach" pa le cholupam wuj.

alt-trans.target: Jat pa cholb’al chak To’ba’nem, cha’ ‘Tob’anem’ xuquje’ tzukuj "Wuj sik’talik uwach" chi upam ri cholno’j.

trans-unit.source: Go to the Help menu and choose: "Building Reader Templates".
trans-unit.target: Jat pa ri Tob'cholb’al chak k'ate k'u ri' chacha’: “Uwokik taq raqanib’al rech sik’ib’al”.

alt-trans.target: Jat pa ri cholb’al chak to’b’anik xuquje’ cha’: “Uwokik taq raqanib’al rech sik’ib’al” Raqanib’al.
Jat pa ri cholb’al chak to’b’anik xuquje’ cha’: “Uwokik taq raqanib’al rech sik’ib’al” Raqanib’al.
